title: 5.6 magnitude earthquake triggers tsunami warning in Japan
content: A 5.6-magnitude earthquake struck near Japan’s Izu Islands, leading to a tsunami warning predicting waves up to 1 meter. A smaller tsunami of about 50 centimeters was detected on Hachijo Island. No immediate damage or injuries were reported, highlighting Japan's preparedness for such events due to its location on the Pacific “Ring of Fire.”
summary: A 5.6-magnitude earthquake struck near Japan’s Izu Islands, leading to a tsunami warning predicting waves up to 1 meter. A smaller tsunami of about 50 centimeters was detected on Hachijo Island. No immediate damage or injuries were reported, highlighting Japan's preparedness for such events due to its location on the Pacific “Ring of Fire.”

title: California mandates smartphone restrictions in schools to boost focus
content: California school districts are now required to create rules limiting student smartphone use under a new law signed by Governor Gavin Newsom. The legislation aims to curb classroom distractions and address social media's negative impact on students' mental health. Districts must implement policies by July 1, 2026, updating them every five years.
summary: California school districts are now required to create rules limiting student smartphone use under a new law signed by Governor Gavin Newsom. The legislation aims to curb classroom distractions and address social media's negative impact on students' mental health. Districts must implement policies by July 1, 2026, updating them every five years.

title: Widow of tech billionaire faces $250M lawsuit for ‘reputational damage’ following Bayesian Superyacht sinking
content: A lawyer representing the builder of the Bayesian superyacht that sank off Sicily has filed a $250 million lawsuit against Mike Lynch's widow. The Italian Sea Group (TISG) denies authorizing this legal action and seeks its withdrawal. The sinking led to substantial business losses and reputational damage for TISG.
summary: A lawyer representing the builder of the Bayesian superyacht that sank off Sicily has filed a $250 million lawsuit against Mike Lynch's widow. The Italian Sea Group (TISG) denies authorizing this legal action and seeks its withdrawal. The sinking led to substantial business losses and reputational damage for TISG.

title: In Iran, old-time US radio detective 'Johnny Dollar' returns
US' Florida on high alert as Hurricane Helene approaches
content: Florida's Gulf Coast and Panhandle are on alert as Tropical Storm Nine strengthens into a potential hurricane. Governor Ron DeSantis declared a state of emergency for 41 counties to facilitate preparations. The National Hurricane Center warns of dangerous rip currents, storm surges, damaging winds, and heavy rainfall beginning Wednesday. Residents should make emergency plans and know their evacuation zones.
summary: Florida's Gulf Coast and Panhandle are on alert as Tropical Storm Nine strengthens into a potential hurricane. Governor Ron DeSantis declared a state of emergency for 41 counties to facilitate preparations. The National Hurricane Center warns of dangerous rip currents, storm surges, damaging winds, and heavy rainfall beginning Wednesday. Residents should make emergency plans and know their evacuation zones.

title: Venezuela issues arrest warrant for Argentina president over plane 'theft'

Will Kamala Harris's $5 million daily outspending secure her victory over Trump?
content: US Democratic presidential nominee Kamala Harris is outspending former President Donald Trump by nearly $5 million daily. In August, Harris' campaign raised $361 million compared to Trump's $130 million. This financial boost has enabled her to dominate TV advertising as both candidates prepare for the November election.
summary: US Democratic presidential nominee Kamala Harris is outspending former President Donald Trump by nearly $5 million daily. In August, Harris' campaign raised $361 million compared to Trump's $130 million. This financial boost has enabled her to dominate TV advertising as both candidates prepare for the November election.

title: 'I want to have some dignity': Terminally ill US woman plans assisted death in Switzerland
content: Gayle Hendrix, a terminally ill woman from Missouri with lupus and interstitial lung disease, is set to travel to Switzerland for a physician-assisted death. Despite family disagreements, she wishes to maintain control over her final moments and avoid further deterioration. US regulations on assisted death prompted her decision for this journey.
summary: Gayle Hendrix, a terminally ill woman from Missouri with lupus and interstitial lung disease, is set to travel to Switzerland for a physician-assisted death. Despite family disagreements, she wishes to maintain control over her final moments and avoid further deterioration. US regulations on assisted death prompted her decision for this journey.

title: Diddy List: Names of celebrities connected to Sean Combs viral
content: A list of celebrities linked to P Diddy's controversial parties is circulating online, featuring names like Leonardo DiCaprio, Jay-Z, and Beyoncé. P Diddy faces serious charges of sex trafficking and racketeering. Amid the scandal, celebrities such as Usher and Megan Fox have deleted their social media posts, raising further speculation.
summary: A list of celebrities linked to P Diddy's controversial parties is circulating online, featuring names like Leonardo DiCaprio, Jay-Z, and Beyoncé. P Diddy faces serious charges of sex trafficking and racketeering. Amid the scandal, celebrities such as Usher and Megan Fox have deleted their social media posts, raising further speculation.

title: 'Is Kamala Harris a Marxist?': Fake videos and AI images fuel communist claims
content: Kamala Harris is facing misleading claims associating her with socialism or communism, which exploit fears among voters from repressive regimes. Despite debunking efforts, manipulated videos and images are widely shared, especially in Spanish-speaking communities. This spread of misinformation has raised concerns and drawn criticism for its impact on public perception.
summary: Kamala Harris is facing misleading claims associating her with socialism or communism, which exploit fears among voters from repressive regimes. Despite debunking efforts, manipulated videos and images are widely shared, especially in Spanish-speaking communities. This spread of misinformation has raised concerns and drawn criticism for its impact on public perception.

title: Confident Prince Harry shines in New York without Meghan Markle: 'They are living more separate lives'
content: ​Royal expert Phil Dampier said Harry and Meghan are living more separate lives and Harry is trying to carve out what exactly his future is. "He wants more fulfilling roles for himself," Phil said. ​A body language expert told Mirror that without Meghan by his side, Harry did not just blend into the background but showed the world that he was totally in his element.
summary: ​Royal expert Phil Dampier said Harry and Meghan are living more separate lives and Harry is trying to carve out what exactly his future is. "He wants more fulfilling roles for himself," Phil said. ​A body language expert told Mirror that without Meghan by his side, Harry did not just blend into the background but showed the world that he was totally in his element.

title: 'My staff says no...': Joe Biden invites young girls on stage at White House event
content: During a White House event honoring the 2023 National Women's Soccer League champions, Gotham FC, President Joe Biden acknowledged that his aides often restrict his actions, yet he chooses to proceed regardless. He invited young girls and boys from the audience to join him on stage, which raised concerns due to previous criticisms of his interactions with children and women.
summary: During a White House event honoring the 2023 National Women's Soccer League champions, Gotham FC, President Joe Biden acknowledged that his aides often restrict his actions, yet he chooses to proceed regardless. He invited young girls and boys from the audience to join him on stage, which raised concerns due to previous criticisms of his interactions with children and women.

title: Vivek Ramaswamy says he's worried November may have a rude surprise unless...
content: Vivek Ramaswamy said the Republicans became lazy and though they railed against the Democrats but without offering an alternative vision of the Republicans. "We're not up against a candidate here. We're up against a machine. We're not going to win this by obsessing over the other side's shenanigans. We're going to win this by answering who we are and what we actually stand for," Vivek said calling Joe Biden and Kamala Harris mere cogs in the wheel.
summary: Vivek Ramaswamy said the Republicans became lazy and though they railed against the Democrats but without offering an alternative vision of the Republicans. "We're not up against a candidate here. We're up against a machine. We're not going to win this by obsessing over the other side's shenanigans. We're going to win this by answering who we are and what we actually stand for," Vivek said calling Joe Biden and Kamala Harris mere cogs in the wheel.

title: US is sending more troops to the Middle East as violence rises between Israel and Hezbollah
content: The U.S. is deploying additional military personnel to the Middle East as violence between Israel and Hezbollah in Lebanon intensifies, potentially leading to a wider regional conflict. The Pentagon has withheld details on troop numbers and missions. Meanwhile, the State Department advises Americans in Lebanon to depart due to increasing dangers.
summary: The U.S. is deploying additional military personnel to the Middle East as violence between Israel and Hezbollah in Lebanon intensifies, potentially leading to a wider regional conflict. The Pentagon has withheld details on troop numbers and missions. Meanwhile, the State Department advises Americans in Lebanon to depart due to increasing dangers.

title: 'Let me...': TikTok creator slams Kamala Harris, says unauthorised clip in Oprah’s interview
content: TikTok creator Blaire Allison publicly criticized Oprah Winfrey's town hall with Kamala Harris for using her video without permission. Allison expressed discontent with Harris's presidential ambitions and clarified that Winfrey’s team did not secure her consent to use the clip. Her comments about financial struggles faced by average Americans gained significant traction on social media.
summary: TikTok creator Blaire Allison publicly criticized Oprah Winfrey's town hall with Kamala Harris for using her video without permission. Allison expressed discontent with Harris's presidential ambitions and clarified that Winfrey’s team did not secure her consent to use the clip. Her comments about financial struggles faced by average Americans gained significant traction on social media.

title: Drunk passenger screams 'plane is on fire', handcuffed and strapped to her seat
content: An allegedly intoxicated passenger on an Azul airline flight from Recife to Viracopos Airport caused a commotion by shouting that the plane was on fire and would crash. Crew members restrained her after she resisted their efforts to calm her down. She was arrested upon landing for causing a disturbance. Azul airline issued a statement that the company follows the highest safety standards and regulations of national and international authorities
summary: An allegedly intoxicated passenger on an Azul airline flight from Recife to Viracopos Airport caused a commotion by shouting that the plane was on fire and would crash. Crew members restrained her after she resisted their efforts to calm her down. She was arrested upon landing for causing a disturbance.  Azul airline issued a statement that the company follows the highest safety standards and regulations of national and international authorities

title: OceanGate used ‘absolutely idiotic’ hand-typed spreadsheet for Titan sub-navigation, says former contractor
content: A former OceanGate contractor revealed that the Titan submersible used a hand-typed Excel spreadsheet for navigation, which caused delays and raised safety concerns before its implosion during a Titanic expedition. The incident resulted in the deaths of all five individuals aboard, including OceanGate's CEO Stockton Rush, who used an acoustic positioning system for navigation.
summary: A former OceanGate contractor revealed that the Titan submersible used a hand-typed Excel spreadsheet for navigation, which caused delays and raised safety concerns before its implosion during a Titanic expedition. The incident resulted in the deaths of all five individuals aboard, including OceanGate's CEO Stockton Rush, who used an acoustic positioning system for navigation.

title: US woman uses dark net to hire hitman to kill wife of man met on dating site, jailed for 100 months
content: A Tennessee woman named Melody Sasser has been sentenced to 100 months in prison for attempting to hire a hitman via a dark website to kill the wife of a man she met online. She paid $9,750 in Bitcoin and requested it appear as an accident. The plan failed, leading to her arrest.
summary: A Tennessee woman named Melody Sasser has been sentenced to 100 months in prison for attempting to hire a hitman via a dark website to kill the wife of a man she met online. She paid $9,750 in Bitcoin and requested it appear as an accident. The plan failed, leading to her arrest.
